comments.body: I don't really like that we're returning an unscrubbed internal error... is it ok to omit this from the error response, and rely on the logs to get the specific error instead?
This would be a follow-up, right?
Also look at the call sites. Most of them have custom errors already. Maybe we should fix the remaining ones.

@@ -1,1 +76,80 @@// InternalError renders a simple internal error
func InternalError(w http.ResponseWriter, req *http.Request, err error) {
	http.Error(w, sanitizer.Replace(fmt.Sprintf("Internal Server Error: %q: %v", req.RequestURI, err)),
		http.StatusInternalServerError)
	utilruntime.HandleError(err)
